problem.markdown:
What is the approximate specific enthalpy value of a 0.5 kg steam if its pressure is 3 bar and the entropy is 2.85 kJ/kg K?
( ) 100 kJ/kg (x) 1100 kJ/kg ( ) 800 kJ/kg ( ) 2200 kJ/kg
problem.p: What is the approximate specific enthalpy value of a 0.5 kg steam if its pressure is 3 bar and the entropy is 2.85 kJ/kg K?
